metadata.title: Black Face Mask Charcoal Peel Off Mask Blackhead Remover Mask Whiteheads Mask for Men and Women with Brush, Nature Ingredients Black Mask for Cleaning Nose or Face 100g
features: EFFICIENT BLACKHEADS REMOVAL-This peel off mask's main component is activated bamboo charcoal, featuring delicate and porous molecules and strong adsorption capacity, which can better remove blackheads and whiteheads.
SAFE & NATURAL-The main ingredients of the black mask are taken from natural bamboo and charcoal and do not contain any corrosive components. The charcoal mask is absolutely safe.
DEEP SKIN CARE- After using our charcoal peel off mask, your pores will no longer feel breathless and the black face mask will give your face an unexpectedly smooth and supple appearance.

MULTIPLE FUNCTIONS-The black mask not only removes blackheads on the forehead, nose or chin, but the charcoal mask is also suitable for fans of computer or TV long-term user. Save people from oily skin, strawberry nose, large pores or blackheads.

PERFECT FOR ALL SKIN TYPES-This peel off mask is suitable for all skin types, but we suggest taking an allergy test at first just in case.This is a charcoal mask that can be shared by the whole family and no longer worry about skin allergies.
